text: wla tznn aladhin yafrahun bima 'atau min afeal qbyht kalyhwd walmunafiqin wghyrhm, wayuhibuwn 'an yuthni ealayhim alnaas bima lam yfelu, fala tznnhm najin min eadhab allah fi aldnya, walahum fi alakhirat eadhab mwje. wafi alayat waeid shadid likuli at lfel alsuw' mejb bh, walikuli mftkhr bima lam yeml, lyuthny ealayh alnaas wyhmdwh
